Articles.Content:
no

TUBM does not have the guts to open my profile.

(it looks so gud and cute <3)

Kind of user profile click bait. Plus, I have user customization hidden.

TUBM Agrees with me, my user profile is #BADA55.

Lol no, I "have user customization hidden".

TUBM loves the Round-8 <3

nope, I am somewhere between the yes and the no on the round-8!

The person below me has made a stupid comment in the past hour.

RUUUUUUDE!

Don't you dare sandwich me!

Yes I will.

The User Below Me is impressed by the current amount of space ants in our volcanoes.

Yep

The user below me knows the answer to 9+10 (It's not 19)

In fact, using the most common user math system in the "Western" world, the answer is 19. So it depends on what math system are you using.

The user below me knows the band System of a down or their singer, Serj Tankian (they're awesome IMHO).

Sorry, never met them ;(

The user below me is a fan of the band Soundgarden.

Nope. Yet. Might listen to them this evening, though. Then, who knows...

The user below me can make a spaceplane.

Sorry. I cannot. Read user title for futher information.

TUBM likes FPS games.

I LOVE them!

The user below me has more then 500 hours played of KSP.

More than 5000 maybe... Unregistered. ;(

The user below me isn't from north america.

True.

The user below me can talk in Alienese.

ayy lmao, ayy?

EDIT: wait a second...

overfloater = sstos

overfloater guy in youtube = also sstos

JEBUS KRIST IT'S HIM

False. I don't understand it. :-[

The user below me is some guy in youtube.

I'm not IN Youtube for say, but I am on it.

The person below me loves Queen (the band from the 70's and 80's).

Queen are the Champions!

The user below me understood that.

If not for that second line, I wouldn't have. You made me read twice!

Greetings, fellow nerds. In this video, we're going to discuss why you're reading this like Dr. Lithium. Can I get a volunteer? How about this guy?

*Uses invisibility cloak* AKA No.

The user below me has applied a real decal, the kind you cut out and soak in water, at least once. Bonus points if they've used a decal setter, such as mark-fit or solva-set.

Yep, long long ago when I was making USS Enterprise CVN-65 out of plastic kit.

TUBM has ever built a model.

Yes. It was a Titanic model.

The user below me likes Pizza Rolls

Never had em.

The person below me likes to act impishly.

Heck yeah!

The person below me lives in Canada.

Barely. I'm right at the edge, I live closer to France than the US. Or any other province of Canada.

The user below me has eaten corn that was picked the same day.

Yup.

TUBM is a moderator
